project_abstract.cdata: This is a credit to the People's Republic of China to help finance the Hebei Earthquake Rehabilitation Project. The project's primary objective is to assist in the restoration of economic and social activities following an earthquake in Zhangjiakou Municipality in northwest Hebei province, by restoring social and economic infrastructure and priority production facilities. A second objective is to strengthen the socioeconomic situation in the area through enhancing productive activities, which would alleviate the extreme poverty. The project supports emergency reconstruction, repair, and rehabilitation (and for some components, equipment purchases) of housing; schools; health care facilities; grain storage facilities; drinking water facilities--including distribution networks; water conservancy facilities--a reservoir, wells, buildings, canals, bridges, aqueducts, etc.; and irrigation works--shallow stone wells, dug wells, tube wells, and small sprinkler irrigation systems. An added component provides technical assistance, training, and support to municipal, county, and township level agencies, particularly for building standard development, project management, and monitoring.

P056491.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>河北地震恢复项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>该项目的主要目的是恢复该地区的社会和经济基础设施和主要生产设施。第二个目的是促进恢复农业生产率以帮助地震灾区的极贫人口脱贫。该项目将支持重建或修复1.5－2万房屋、26所医院和600座学校，为学校和医院购买设备提供资金。该项目还将帮助恢复饮用水的供应输送设施；水井、建筑、水渠、桥梁等节水设施；粮食储备设施；安装水井和小型喷灌系统等。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
